version_description:
• Bug fixes

5.4:

• Pinnacle Studio for iPhone is now Pinnacle Studio! Pinnacle Studio is fully universal with all features available on iPhones and iPads

• New: Improved UI layout for different size iPhones

• Fully updated for iOS 9

• Bug fixes

• For more export options, 4K support, dual-view trimming, live audio mixing and more, get the Pinnacle Studio Pro app, also available on the app store

• Bug fixes

5.4:

• Pinnacle Studio for iPhone is now Pinnacle Studio! Pinnacle Studio is fully universal with all features available on iPhones and iPads

• New: Improved UI layout for different size iPhones

• Fully updated for iOS 9

• Bug fixes

• For more export options, 4K support, dual-view trimming, live audio mixing and more, get the Pinnacle Studio Pro app, also available on the app store

• Improved playback performance
• Fixed issue where timeline would not begin to scroll on first playback of a project
• Other bug fixes

• You can get help for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47)

5.4:

• Pinnacle Studio for iPhone is now Pinnacle Studio! Pinnacle Studio is fully universal with all features available on iPhones and iPads

• New: Improved UI layout for different size iPhones

• Fully updated for iOS 9

• Bug fixes

• For more export options, 4K support, dual-view trimming, live audio mixing and more, get the Pinnacle Studio Pro app, also available on the app store

• Fixed audio sync issues with transitions and titles
• Other bug fixes

• You can get help for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47)

• Check out LumaClip from Luma Touch, a free universal app that's a great companion to Pinnacle Studio for reversing and reframing video clips. Available in the App Store now.

• Fixed audio sync issues with transitions and titles
• Other bug fixes

• You can get help for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47)

• Check out LumaClip from Luma Touch, a free universal app that's a great companion to Pinnacle Studio for reversing and reframing video clips. Available in the App Store now.

• Fixed audio sync issues with transitions and titles
• Other bug fixes

• You can get help for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47)

• Check out LumaClip from Luma Touch, a free universal app that's a great companion to Pinnacle Studio for reversing and reframing video clips. Available in the App Store now.

• Fixed audio sync issues with transitions and titles
• Other bug fixes

• You can get help for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47)

• Check out LumaClip from Luma Touch, a free universal app that's a great companion to Pinnacle Studio for reversing and reframing video clips. Available in the App Store now.

• Fixed audio sync issues with transitions and titles
• Other bug fixes

• You can get help for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47)

• Check out LumaClip from Luma Touch, a free universal app that's a great companion to Pinnacle Studio for reversing and reframing video clips. Available in the App Store now.

• Changed User Media items to list view
• Fixed blank user media in album after deleting media
• Fixed volume being reduced by half on export
• Fixed crash for iOS 8 users (we still recommend updating to latest iOS)

• We are always happy to get your questions and comments for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47).

• Check out LumaClip from Luma Touch (the small team that develops and supports Pinnacle Studio), a free universal app that's a great companion to Pinnacle Studio for reversing and reframing video clips. Available in the App Store now.

•• Warning: This update will crash on certain devices - we are submitting a fix for this immediately. We apologize for the inconvenience.

• Updated to Facebook v2.6 API
• Updated alerts to take advantage of new iOS 9 features

• Improved timeline icon rendering
• Improved stability with a number of bug fixes

• We are always happy to get your questions and comments for Pinnacle Studio at forums.luma-touch.com (registration code 52pstudio47).
